articles.title: ‘Feisty’ 103-year-old woman celebrates with beer after beating COVID-19 - The Indian Express
articles.description: To celebrate her recovery from COVID-19, 103-year-old Jennie Stejna enjoyed an ice-cold beer, something she loved but hadn’t had in a long time.
